column4: woohoo! finally got beryl+xgl on my ati 200m with fglrx 8.24 with dapper! :)
any news on amd opening up the ati drivers?
interesting, as i have that chipset in my lapto
very annoying isn't it?
just that i have edgy and not yet bothered with the fglrx drivers, which are now up to 8.30.something
the fglrx drivers dont work! :)
only 8.24 works
for the ati 200m that is!
i ran 8.28.8 last on my 200m (amd64 laptop)
and u got 3d rendering?
aye
HOW!!!
i tried everything, and i couldn't get 3d rendering! that's y i reverted to dapper ( the 8.24 work on dapper, and i dont know how to install them on edgy! :S )

i used the ati installer in sourcemage last, but there amd64 is not so nice 32bit/64bit wise (Although i have made a spell for 32bit libs for it) so i had to move some stuff around, the installer puts libGL.so.2 and friends in /usr/X11R6 dirs when the lib and the drivers should be in the right /usr/lib/xorg dirs

in other words i went around the package manager of a distro and i got it working, just moved 32bit libs in its own place, left 64bit where ldd looked for them , added the location for the 32bit libs to ld.so.conf and voila got it all happy, but i might be better in doing it rather than explaining it

i've talked to a lot of ppl who were suffering from this driver and this particular chipset, even the ati fglrx howto says it's not supported, y don't u write a howto or somethn, coz it seems a bit out my league to figure out, and i am sure a lot of ppl would appreciate it!
hm, now i am curious about installing it, and i have no idea why you say it is not supported, we are both talking about the Xpress 200m, right? last time i looked it said it is supported
hold on, i'll post the howto that i use
eff the howto if it says something that is not matching the release notes ;)
i have suffered with this card since 8.18 with different workarounds, the relase notes on the ati website always said that it is supported, when it actually isn't,
and i have had many release since 8.16.20 running, last one i ran was 8.28.8, but brb
:S what is ur computer? mine is a hp pavilion 5094 with amd64 ml-37! i guess u have some kind of lucky combination!
